verses.verse: These are the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285>, which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872> to make <WH3772> <WH8800> with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, beside the covenant <WH1285> which he made <WH3772> <WH8804> with them in Horev <WH2722>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> all that the YY <WH3068> did <WH6213> <WH8804> before your eyes <WH5869> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and unto all his servants <WH5650>, and unto all his land <WH776>;
The great <WH1419> temptations <WH4531> which thine eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> <WH8804>, the signs <WH226>, and those great <WH1419> miracles <WH4159>:

Yet the YY <WH3068> hath not given <WH5414> <WH8804> you an heart <WH3820> to perceive <WH3045> <WH8800>, and eyes <WH5869> to see <WH7200> <WH8800>, and ears <WH241> to hear <WH8085> <WH8800>, unto this day <WH3117>.

And I have led <WH3212> <WH8686> you forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness <WH4057>: your clothes <WH8008> are not waxen old <WH1086> <WH8804> upon you, and thy shoe <WH5275> is not waxen old <WH1086> <WH8804> upon thy foot <WH7272>.

Ye have not eaten <WH398> <WH8804> bread <WH3899>, neither have ye drunk <WH8354> <WH8804> wine <WH3196> or strong drink <WH7941>: that ye might know <WH3045> <WH8799> that I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.

And when ye came <WH935> <WH8799> unto this place <WH4725>, Sichon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, came out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> us unto battle <WH4421>, and we smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them:

And we took <WH3947> <WH8799> their land <WH776>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> it for an inheritance <WH5159> unto the Re'uvenites <WH7206>, and to the Gadites <WH1425>, and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4520>.
Keep <WH8104> <WH8804> therefore the words <WH1697> of this covenant <WH1285>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them, that ye may prosper <WH7919> <WH8686> in all that ye do <WH6213> <WH8799>.

Ye stand <WH5324> <WH8737> this day <WH3117> all of you before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>; your captains <WH7218> of your tribes <WH7626>, your elders <WH2205>, and your officers <WH7860> <WH8802>, with all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>,

Your little ones <WH2945>, your wives <WH802>, and thy stranger <WH1616> that is in <WH7130> thy camp <WH4264>, from the hewer <WH2404> <WH8802> of thy wood <WH6086> unto the drawer <WH7579> <WH8802> of thy water <WH4325>:

That thou shouldest enter <WH5674> <WH8800> into covenant <WH1285> with the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and into his oath <WH423>, which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> maketh <WH3772> <WH8802> with thee this day <WH3117>:

That he may establish <WH6965> <WH8687> thee to day <WH3117> for a people <WH5971> unto himself, and that he may be unto thee a 'Elohim <WH430>, as he hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thee, and as he hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1>, to Avraham <WH85>, to Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and to Ya`akov <WH3290>.
Neither with you only do I make <WH3772> <WH8802> this covenant <WH1285> and this oath <WH423>;
But with him that standeth <WH5975> <WH8802> here with us this <WH3426> day <WH3117> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, and also with him that is not here with us this day <WH3117>:

(For ye know <WH3045> <WH8804> how we have dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>; and how we came <WH5674> <WH8804> through <WH7130> the nations <WH1471> which ye passed by <WH5674> <WH8804>;
And ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8799> their abominations <WH8251>, and their idols <WH1544>, wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>, silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, which were among them:)

Lest there should be <WH3426> among you man <WH376>, or woman <WH802>, or family <WH4940>, or tribe <WH7626>, whose heart <WH3824> turneth away <WH6437> <WH8802> this day <WH3117> from the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, to go <WH3212> <WH8800> and serve <WH5647> <WH8800> the 'elohim <WH430> of these nations <WH1471>; lest there should be <WH3426> among you a root <WH8328> that beareth <WH6509> <WH8802> gall <WH7219> and wormwood <WH3939>;

And it come to pass, when he heareth <WH8085> <WH8800> the words <WH1697> of this curse <WH423>, that he bless <WH1288> <WH8694> himself in his heart <WH3824>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I shall have peace <WH7965>, though <WH3588> I walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in the imagination <WH8307> of mine heart <WH3820>, to add <WH5595> <WH8800> drunkenness <WH7302> to thirst <WH6771>:

The YY <WH3068> will <WH14> <WH8799> not spare <WH5545> <WH8800> him, but then the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> and his jealousy <WH7068> shall smoke <WH6225> <WH8799> against that man <WH376>, and all the curses <WH423> that are written <WH3789> <WH8803> in this book <WH5612> shall lie <WH7257> <WH8804> upon him, and the YY <WH3068> shall blot out <WH4229> <WH8804> his name <WH8034> from under heaven <WH8064>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall separate <WH914> <WH8689> him unto evil <WH7451> out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, according to all the curses <WH423> of the covenant <WH1285> that are written <WH3789> <WH8803> in this book <WH5612> of the Torah <WH8451>:

So that the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314> of your children <WH1121> that shall rise up <WH6965> <WH8799> after <WH310> you, and the stranger <WH5237> that shall come <WH935> <WH8799> from a far <WH7350> land <WH776>, shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, when they see <WH7200> <WH8804> the plagues <WH4347> of that land <WH776>, and the sicknesses <WH8463> which the YY <WH3068> hath laid <WH2470> <WH8765> upon it;

And that the whole land <WH776> thereof is brimstone <WH1614>, and salt <WH4417>, and burning <WH8316>, that it is not sown <WH2232> <WH8735>, nor beareth <WH6779> <WH8686>, nor any grass <WH6212> groweth <WH5927> <WH8799> therein, like the overthrow <WH4114> of Sodom <WH5467>, and Gomorrah <WH6017>, Admah <WH126>, and Zeboim <WH6636>, which the YY <WH3068> overthrew <WH2015> <WH8804> in his anger <WH639>, and in his wrath <WH2534>:

Havahn all nations <WH1471> shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, Wherefore hath the YY <WH3068> done <WH6213> <WH8804> thus unto this land <WH776>? what meaneth the heat <WH2750> of this great <WH1419> anger <WH639> ?

Then men shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, Because they have forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of their fathers <WH1>, which he made <WH3772> <WH8804> with them when he brought them forth <WH3318> <WH8687> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:

For they went <WH3212> <WH8799> and served <WH5647> <WH8799> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> them, 'elohim <WH430> whom they knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not, and whom he had not given <WH2505> <WH8804> unto them:

And the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> against this land <WH776>, to bring <WH935> <WH8687> upon it all the curses <WH7045> that are written <WH3789> <WH8803> in this book <WH5612>:

And the YY <WH3068> rooted <WH5428> <WH8799> them out of their land <WH127> in anger <WH639>, and in wrath <WH2534>, and in great <WH1419> indignation <WH7110>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> them into another <WH312> land <WH776>, as it is this day <WH3117>.

The secret <WH5641> <WH8737> things belong unto the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>: but those things which are revealed <WH1540> <WH8737> belong unto us and to our children <WH1121> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>, that we may do <WH6213> <WH8800> all the words <WH1697> of this Torah <WH8451>.
